creature.title: Bullywug Champion

block.name: Rancid Air
block.line: Each enemy that spends a healing surge within the aura is weakened until the start of the acting creature's next turn.

block.name: Aquatic
block.line: The bullywug can breathe underwater.
In aquatic combat, the bullywug gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.

block.name: Nature's Release
block.line: Any attacker that scores a critical hit against the bullywug regains 4 hit points.

block.name: Spear
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 1d8 + 4 damage.
Effect: The target is marked until the end of the champion's next turn.

block.name: Crossbow
block.line: Attack: Ranged 15/30 (one creature); +4 vs. AC
Hit: 1d8 + 2 damage.

block.name: Champion's Charge
block.line: Effect: The champion charges and makes the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.
Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 2d6 + 5 damage.
Effect: The target is marked until the end of the champion's next turn.

block.name: Taunting Croak
block.note: when the champion spends an action point
block.line: Attack: Close burst 5 (each enemy in the burst); +4 vs. Will
Hit: The target is pulled 4 squares.
Miss: The target is pulled 1 square.

block.name: Interceding Strike
block.line: Trigger (Immediate Interrupt): A creature marked by the champion makes an attack that doesn't include the champion as a target
Attack: Melee 1 (the triggering enemy); +7 vs. AC
Hit: 1d8 + 4 damage.
Miss: 5 damage.

creature.description: A rare breed, a bullywug champion stands a head taller than most bullywugs

block.name: Rancid Air

block.name: Aquatic

block.name: Quarterstaff

block.name: Fiery Croak
block.line: Attack: Area burst 1 within 15 squares (each creature in the burst); +6 vs. Reflex
+2 to attack if at least one ally is targeted

block.name: Electric Reflux

+2 to attack if at least one ally is targeted

creature.description: A mud lord possesses greater intelligence and presence than others of its kind; it prefers to keep out of harm's way and draws power from sacrificing underlings

creature.title: Bullywug Twitcher

block.name: Rancid Air
block.line: Each enemy that spends a healing surge within the aura is weakened until the start of the acting creature's next turn.

block.name: Aquatic
block.line: The bullywug can breathe underwater.
In aquatic combat, the bullywug gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls against nonaquatic creatures.

block.name: Nature's Release
block.line: Any attacker that scores a critical hit against the bullywug regains 3 hit points.

block.name: Javelin
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10/20 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 1d6 + 4 damage.

block.name: Spasmodic Leap
block.line: Effect: The twitcher is no longer marked, and it jumps 3 squares. This movement counts as a shift.
Attack: Melee 1 or Ranged 10/20 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 2d8 + 4 damage, and an additional +1d6 damage if the twitcher has combat advantage against the target.
The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls against the twitcher until the end of the twitcher's next turn.

creature.description: This frog-like humanoid spasms around the battlefield erratically, making it hard to know where its javelins will come from
